sentence.Network_en: Carol is a tall, dark, Latin type of woman.
sentence.Network_cn: 卡萝尔身材高大，黑发棕肤，是个有着拉丁风情的女子。

sentence.Network_en: Latin and Greek will be squeezed out of school timetables.
sentence.Network_cn: 拉丁语和希腊语将退出学校的课程表。

sentence.Network_en: Above its doors was a Latin inscription: Non omnia possumus omnes.
sentence.Network_cn: 门的上方刻有拉丁文铭“人非万能”。
